word_count.title: Word Count
word_count.description: Select the number of words per game
word_count.note: Note: If registered words are less than selected, all registered words will be used

difficulty.title: Difficulty
difficulty.description: Select game difficulty. Time limit and miss penalty will be adjusted
difficulty.easy_desc: For beginners. Generous time limit and mild penalties
difficulty.normal_desc: Balanced standard settings. Recommended for most users
difficulty.hard_desc: For advanced users. Tight time limit and strict penalties

practice_mode.title: Practice Mode
practice_mode.balanced_desc: Balanced mix of weaknesses, review, and new words
practice_mode.weakness_desc: Focus on words you struggle with

time_limit.title: Time Limit
time_limit.adaptive_desc: Automatically adjusts to your skill level
time_limit.fixed_desc: Practice with a constant time limit
time_limit.comfort_note: Note: Time limit comfort can be adjusted in difficulty settings

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.srs_desc: Present review words at optimal timing based on the forgetting curve
advanced.warmup_desc: Start with easier words and gradually increase difficulty

theme.title: Theme
theme.note: Note: Theme changes will be reflected in future updates
